channel.title: Dead Space 3 walkthrough/gameplay videos here
channel.description:
Hi i have set up a new channel and have started to upload gameplay footage of dead space 3. The videos are in 1080p for maximum quality. There is no commentary. So far only one gameplay video is up, there will be another up later on tonight GMT time. I should be able to get 2 videos up per day.
Link to my youtube channel where you will find the gameplay videos:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/user/LoneWolfPlaythroughs/[/url]
If you don't mind please give me constructive feedback if you have any. Comment, like and subscribe to my channel if you like my videos to help my channel grow.
Thanks for your time.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Walkthrough Part 1 - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-zYekzSS67M[/url]
Walkthrough Part 2 - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lfr_...8yq_Rg&index=2[/url]
Walkthrough Part 3 - [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QKWjhIynln4[/url]

item.title: Dead Space 3 walkthrough/gameplay videos here

item.description:
Oh, the system requiremnents for this game are exactly the same as Dead Space 2. Agh, I really want this game now, but I can’t afford it and I don’t think that Origin has sales all that often.

item.title: Dead Space 3 walkthrough/gameplay videos here
item.dc:creator: Lone-Wolf
item.description:
Walkthrough Part 7 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c4lAgoiPwBA

Walkthrough Part 8 - up in 2 hrs

Also feedback on my videos would be great. One main question i have is, is 1080p really worth it? or should i stick to 720p and get 2x more videos up a day. Would manage to get 4 to 6 videos up a day if i did that. The downside would be that the quality would be lowered by quite a bit dependant on your tv screen size.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Space 3 walkthrough/gameplay videos here
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
Pyro:

How much more graphically-intensive is Dead Space 3 compared to DS2, anyone know?

On PC it looks better and once you turn vertical synch off the game is smoother(I sometimes get around 100 FPS).The game is not very demanding on the old system requirements and there are advanced graphical options such as different types of anti-aliasing(FXAA,SMAA)and such.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Space 3 walkthrough/gameplay videos here

item.description:
How much more graphically-intensive is Dead Space 3 compared to DS2, anyone know?

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Space 3 walkthrough/gameplay videos here
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
Playing it right now and it’s a solid 8/10 so far:

  • crafting weapons is a great add on
  • top notch sound design
  • improved gfx( though PC version has locked 30 FPS if you turn the vertical synch on)
  • less scary than the previous games
  • it gets repetitive really fast
  • story is not that good
  • inclusion of the co-op missions in the single player campaign(for instance “these doors can be opened,they are for co-op”)which breaks the immersion

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Space 3 walkthrough/gameplay videos here
item.dc:creator: Lone-Wolf
item.description:
Agreed. The only main gripe i have on the game is that it is very repetitive. But i already expected that so i’m not too fussed.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead Space 3 walkthrough/gameplay videos here
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Tbh it doesn’t look as bad as people are saying. Then again, I never got the arguments against the new action focus because I never regarded Dead Space as a full on horror game anyway.
